statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ 4 \\ -4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -18 \\ -5 \\ 15 \\ 17 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -14 \\ -5 \\ 10 \\ 11 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
